item.description: OK Investors, this is "Take 2". The last Meetup I had scheduled had a low turnout (still with good networking), which I expected due to the fact that it had been a long time since the previous one. But let's make some deals happen. This is an incredible time in the history of this nation's economy, and those that participate in the real estate game now will be the ones who flourish. The "bottom" of the recession is either just past, right now, or right around the corner - but whichever the case may be, we're very close to the bottom, and that's what makes this the best time to get our hands dirty. Bring your passion, your ideas, your resources, your deals, and your hunger - for real estate and for food, since there will be plenty to eat. But please, unlike the last Meetup, if you say you're coming, then come! Looking forward to seeing you on the 19th.

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Let's make some deals happen!
